SELECT u.id, u.user_id, u.device_id, m.`name`, (YEAR (CURDATE()) - SUBSTRING( m.id_card, 7, 4 )) AS age, m.sex, m.id_card, m.tel, d.device_name, d.device_code FROM device_user u LEFT JOIN user_management m ON u.user_id = m.id LEFT JOIN device_management d ON u.device_id = d.id INNER JOIN device_monitor_log l ON u.id = l.device_user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND u.delete_flag = '0' AND m.delete_flag = '0' AND d.delete_flag = '0'
AND m.name like '%${pageDTO.name}%'
AND m.id_card like '%${pageDTO.idCard}%'
AND m.sex = #{pageDTO.sex}
AND d.device_name like '%${pageDTO.deviceName}%'
AND d.device_code like '%${pageDTO.deviceCode}%'
GROUP BY id
